attributes.action: Advise and Educate the American Government to cease and control their efforts to induce war with Iran - and if he is unable to do so, refuse to support this action/policy on behalf of the British People
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The American military has released today information which it intends to use as a futherance for its cause of war against Iran. 
I urge the Prime Mininster and his Cabinet to disuade The U.S from this action and instead to pursue a path of peace.
I also would urge the Prime Minister to consider that the people of this country do not want another futile, unpopular war.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
